price: 32 Autre signe de Sa toute-puissance, les vaisseaux sillonnant les mers, telles des montagnes altières.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
